Package fr.formiko.formikolauncher

Class Launcher

java.lang.Object
fr.formiko.formikolauncher.Launcher
public class Launcher extends Object
Launcher interface.
All launcher aviable action are functions in this class.
Author:
Hydrolien

      public boolean needToDownloadGame()

    • downloadGame

      public boolean downloadGame(String version)
      download the game at given version.
      Parameters:
      version - the version to download game at
      Returns:
      true if it work

    • launchGame

      public boolean launchGame()
      launch the game with selected version.
      Version can be set before call launchGame() with setVersion(String version).
      Returns:
      true if we need to do launch() again

    • getJarPath

      public String getJarPath()
      Give path to Formiko.jar.
      Returns:
      path to Formiko.jar depending of the OS

    • getJavaCommand

      public String getJavaCommand()
      Give path to execute java.
      Returns:
      path to our java version depending of the OS

    • handleControlC

      private void handleControlC()
      This handler will be called on Control-C pressed. cf http://vkroz.github.io/posts/20170630-Java-interrupt-hook.html
